articles.title: ASML Sinks as China AI Startup Triggers Panic in Tech Stocks - Bloomberg
articles.description: Nvidia Corp. and ASML Holding NV shares plunged early Monday as Chinese artificial intelligence startup DeepSeek appeared to provide comparable performance to Western chatbots at a fraction of the price.
